<p>This week’s FanWork was originally submitted to the Forum by keptin back in October, but in a show of strength and endurance, has recently come to be one of the top posts on /r/kerbalspaceprogram. It’s a simply worded, simply illustrated guide to simple aircraft design.</p>

<p></p>
I remember this, it was (and still is) fantastic!
If I could actually see anything.

This is keptin's illustrated basic spaceplane tutorial. If you're having issues seeing it, the image in full resolution is actually here on the forums:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52080-Basic-Aircraft-Design-Explained-Simply-With-Pictures
Sorry for the unreadable image. I'm leaving this up as evidence of a stupid goof. I reposted it in link form on the Tumblr page.
